briefTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of G238 Compared to Clotrimazole Otic Solution in the Treatment of Otomycosis
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Group, Active Treatment-controlled Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of G238 Compared to Clotrimazole 1% Otic Solution in Patients With Otomycosis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of G238 for the treatment of otomycosis

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects With a Complete Response to Treatment
